citeinfo.title: Chester County Bridge Points

idinfo.accconst: Subject to Geographic Information Systems Access Policy. The GIS database is owned and copyrighted by the County of Chester. No access to, use of, or processing of the database or any product, service, or other item which is or may be a part thereof or derived therefrom shall be permitted without the express written consent of the County. The County will place this restriction on the face of the products generated by the GIS, or in contracts for services, software licenses or other appropriate agreement.
idinfo.useconst: Subject to Geographic Information Systems Access Policy. The User (s) of County of Chester, Pennsylvania information provided by the County, agrees that the GIS database, all products and services derived therefrom, and all rights thereto are owned and copyrighted by the County. The County grants the User the right to use the portion of the GIS database (and any product or service derived therefrom). The GIS database (and any product or service derived therefrom) is prohibited from being sold, duplicated, reproduced, disseminated or shared with any other person, entity or party without the prior express written consent from the County. When the County gives such written consent, any third party/vendor recipient of the GIS database shall be subject to the same terms and conditions as the User, and use of the GIS database shall be for the sole purpose of providing services necessary for the operations of the User.Furthemore, the User agrees to use its best efforts to require and enforce compliance by the additional recipient with the terms and conditions of this agreement, including return, purge or destruction by the additional recipient of its copy of the GIS database upon completion of its services. The User(s) indicate their acceptance of the aforementioned constraints by downloading or receiving the data contained on the GIS website.

attracc.attraccr: Full attribution is available for state-owned bridges greater than 8 feet in length and locally-owned bridges greater than 20 feet in length

distinfo.distliab: The Chester County Geographic Information System was prepared for use by the County for its internal purposes only. It was not designed for use by any other entity or the general public. Any use of the GIS data or any product or service derived therefrom shall be at the sole risk of the person or entity so using the GIS data or its derivative products and services. Chester County makes no representation or warranty as to the accuracy of the GIS database or the accuracy as to labeling, dimensions, contours, property boundaries, or placement or location of any map feature. CHESTER COUNTY MAKES NO WARRANTY OR MERCHANTABILITY OR WARRANTY FOR FITNESS OF USE FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, WITH RESPECT TO THE GIS DATA OR ANY PRODUCT OR SERIVCE DERIVED THEREFROM. Any user or purchaser of the GIS data or any product or service derived therefrom, accepts the same AS IS, WITH ALL FAULTS, and assumes all responsibility for the use thereof, and further covenants and agrees to hold Chester Countyharmless from and against any damage, loss, or liability arising from the use of any GIS product or service. Independent verification of any data, product, or service from the GIS database should be obtained by any user or purchaser thereof. Chester County disclaims, and shall not be liable for, any and all damage, loss, or liability, whether direct, indirect, or consequential, which arises or may arise from the use of any GIS data, product, or service by any person or entity. See the GeographicInformation Systems Access Policy.
